radiographic_examinations.findings: Infective left mid-zone pulmonary lesion; old tuberculosis; resolving left mid zone lesion.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat MRI of spinal cord/brain was unremarkable.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI during deep brain stimulation surgery
radiographic_examinations.findings: Used for stereotactic guidance and preparation of STN target coordinates.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Approximately 4 weeks after surgery, repeat interrogation of each contact up to 7 V did not elicit eyelid apraxia.
